message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a valuable product that I believe could be of significant interest to you.  While I cannot disclose specifics at this time, I can assure you it's worth at least $1500000 to me. I'm offering it to you for $1750000, a price that reflects its potential value.  Please consider this offer carefully, as I have another interested party ready to purchase at $1500000 if you decline.
